\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{PROCESS\_EXITHANDLER}{PROCESS\_EXITHANDLER}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \#define PROCESS\+\_\+\+EXITHANDLER(\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{}]{handler }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}

Specify an action when a process exits.

\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
This declaration must come immediately before the \mbox{\hyperlink{process_8h_a8efc62947f2ca2c870f52896e0dc1a81}{PROCESS\+\_\+\+BEGIN()}} macro.
\end{DoxyNote}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em handler} & The action to be performed. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
